title: 5-Ingredient Fresh Orange Smoothie (Orange Julius Copycat) RITZ BaconWrapped Cheeseburger
directions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, and blend until smooth. Add more ice if you would like.
ingredients: 1/3 cup milk (your preference - regular, soy, coconut, etc.)
1-2 tablespoons honey (or agave or your desired sweetener), if needed
